original_text: And it came to pass the third day, which was Pharaoh's birthday, that he made a feast unto all his servants: and he lifted up the head of the chief butler and of the chief baker among his servants.
korean_text: 제삼일은 바로의 생일이라 바로가 그의 모든 신하를 위하여 잔치를 베풀 때에 술 맡은 관원장과 떡 굽는 관원장에게 그의 신하들 중에 머리를 들게 하니라

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass the third day
that he made a feast unto all his servants
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그의 모든 신하들을 위하여 잔치를 베풀었더라

sentences.original_text: and he lifted up the head of the chief butler
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 술 맡은 관원장의 머리를 들었으며

sentences.original_text: and of the chief baker among his servants
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 신하들 중 떡 맡은 관원장의 머리도 들었더라
